lines.text: I been closer to that gold INside, than any man OUTside. And I tell ya', it can't be taken.

[Reflects for a moment]
Oh, yes it can! Yeeehaaw!

[Throws an empty whiskey bottle in the air and shoots it as it falls]
I knew it, I knew it all the time! Oh, we're gonna' take that gold, and we're gonna' take ALL of it. And you and your tales of old timers don't mean a whiff of cow dung, because you never had the brains or the guts to do it. We're gonna' take it from the INside.
